Posts.Content: witney777 wrote: hi for a few months now i have had discharge from my right nipple, sometimes not a lot, its a milky colour and on one occasion it did have blood in it. recently i have noticed a hard lump by the nipple and have an uncomfortable ache under my rib cage. i can only describe it like having a babys foot under your ribs when pregnant. i had a reduction 7 years ago and alls been well, not sure wether i should really worry or not. can anyone offer reasurrance. thankyou gaenor.x Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: lump by nipple and discharge witney777 BMD

Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2008 03:21PM witney777 wrote: hi and thankyou for replying. no i haven't spoken to my doctor yet, i keep putting it off, silly i know. i suppose the thought of that it could be bad scares me, reading through some of the posts i've found you all to be extremely brave women and i can see you all support each other really well. thankyou for being so kind. x
